name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Vigilant_Assault_F
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Vigilant Assault F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to grant a small amount of damage absorption to the caster and nearby allies for a short time and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This effect will be triggered roughly 5 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Defenders and may be slotted into any Defender damage power.
power_display_names: Superior Vigilant Assault: Recharge/Chance for Minor PBAoE +Absorb (Defender)
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Chance for Minor Ally +Absorb
